content:
Hi,

I am looking for reference sites for implementation of FHIR in Australia and to hear about their experience.

Our Patient Admission Systems only support HL 7 version 2.x

However, out downstream billing systems are interested in consuming FHIR JSON message formats in an asynchronous manner. Any experience or thoughts would be appreciated.
I am not aware of any implementations of that kind of data exchange using FHIR at this time in Australia
